elements.name: Intro_csf_maker_microbit
elements.html:
Code.org Self-paced Online Professional Learning - Computer Science Foundations: Maker with micro:bit

Post-Module Survey

Thanks for learning with us!

Code.org relies on surveys as a crucial tool through which we remain connected to teachers, and to give you the opportunity to provide feedback about our curriculum and your teaching experience, as well as to improve our programs.

Privacy and Confidentiality

  • Your individual responses here are completely confidential.
  • Your identity will never be revealed publicly or used to tie any responses back to you personally.
  • We may share anonymous, aggregate data (representing all responses) publicly.
  • Your anonymized responses will be used by Code.org for program improvement.

Your honesty and candor are appreciated.

Post-Module Survey

elements.name: csf_maker_microbit_better_understanding
elements.title: After completing this module, I have a better understanding of how to use micro:bits in my classroom.

elements.name: csf_maker_microbit_comfort_supporting_students_spritelab
elements.title: After completing this module, I am more comfortable in my ability to support students in using micro:bits to teach physical computing and coding concepts.

elements.name: csf_maker_microbit_know_what_students_learn
elements.title: After completing this module, I have a basic understanding of what my students will learn in Code.org’s Computer Science Foundations: Maker with micro:bit curriculum.

elements.name: csf_maker_microbit_comfort_ability_to_teach
elements.title: After completing this module, I feel more comfortable in my ability to teach Code.org’s Computer Science Foundations: Maker with micro:bit curriculum than I did before starting this professional learning course.

elements.name: csf_maker_microbit_grade_division_helpful
elements.title: Having the course split into different grade levels was helpful to me.

elements.name: csf_maker_microbit_course_navigation
elements.title: Course navigation was clear and easy to follow.

elements.name: csf_maker_microbit_supported_learning
elements.title: Which of the following supported your learning the most? Rank the options from most helpful (5) to least helpful (1). Please apply each rank (1-5) exactly once; don't give the same ranking to two different items.

rows.text: Reading a page that contained text and images about a topic.
Trying a task with step by step instructions.
Making a plan to prepare to teach Code.org's Computer Science Foundations Maker: with micro:bit.
Completing a check for understanding question.

elements.name: csf_maker_microbit_how_long_to_complete
elements.title: How long did you spend completing this module?

elements.name: nps_self_paced_pd
elements.title: How likely are you to recommend this self-paced professional learning experience to a friend or colleague?

elements.name: csf_maker_microbit_how_likely_attend_inperson
elements.title: After engaging in this self-paced professional learning module, how likely are you to attend a facilitator-led professional development workshop for teaching Code.org's K-5 curriculum, if one were offered in your region?

elements.name: csc_other_feedback
elements.title: Do you have any feedback about this module that you would like to share with the Code.org team?

elements.name: csf_maker_microbit_participate_focus_group
elements.title: OPTIONAL: Would you be willing to participate in a follow-up focus group to provide direct feedback about this online course?

elements.name: csf_maker_microbit_email_focus_group
elements.title: Great! Please share an email address where we may contact you.
